snippet: A federal judge in Ohio sentenced the ex-Ohio State and Indianapolis Colts quarterback Art Schlichter to nearly 11 years in prison for what authorities called a million-dollar ticket scheme.
abstract: Former Ohio State and Indianapolis Colts quarterback Art Schlichter is sentenced to nearly 11 years in prison for swindling participants in what authorities call a million-dollar sports ticket scheme.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Ohio sentenced the ex-Ohio State and Indianapolis Colts quarterback Art Schlichter to nearly 11 years in prison for what authorities called a million-dollar ticket scheme.
